metadata.feature_description: Search and filter pages based on workflow status and workflow assignment.

steps.action: Navigate to Content > Pages and click search icon to open Page Search Results
steps.expected: Page Search Results view opens with search and filter options
steps.actual: Page Search Results view opened showing 52 total pages with search field and Advanced Filters option

steps.action: Click on Advanced Filters to expand filter options
steps.expected: Advanced Filters panel expands showing workflow filter option
steps.actual: Advanced Filters panel expanded showing Filter by Page Type, Filter by Publish Status, Filter by Published Date Range, and Filter by Workflow dropdown

steps.action: Click on Filter by Workflow dropdown to view available workflows
steps.expected: Dropdown shows list of available workflows
steps.actual: Dropdown displayed options: None, Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Workflow, Test & <> "Special" Chars!

steps.action: Select 'Content Approval' workflow and click Apply
steps.expected: Results filtered to show only pages with Content Approval workflow
steps.actual: Results filtered showing 3 pages with Content Approval workflow assignment

steps.action: With Content Approval workflow filter active, type 'Template' in search box and click search
steps.expected: Results filtered by both search term and workflow filter
steps.actual: Search returned 1 page: 'Template Workflow Test Page' with Content Approval workflow

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Combine workflow filter with other filters

steps.action: Set Filter by Publish Status to 'Draft' while keeping Content Approval workflow filter
steps.expected: Results filtered by both publish status and workflow
steps.actual: Results showed 3 pages that have Draft status AND Content Approval workflow

steps.action: Clear filters and select 'Direct Publish' workflow, then click Apply
steps.expected: All displayed pages should have Direct Publish workflow assignment
steps.actual: 30 pages found, all displaying 'Workflow: Direct Publish' in their details

steps.action: Scroll through results to verify workflow assignment on each page
steps.expected: Every page in results shows Direct Publish as the workflow
steps.actual: Verified all 30 pages (Home, Activities, Badges, Leaderboard, Activity Feed, My Profile, Messages, Community, Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Groups, Activity, Members, Wiki, Ideas, Friends, Search Results, 404 Error Page, Wiki Test, News, URL Type Test Page) all correctly display 'Workflow: Direct Publish'

steps.action: With Direct Publish filter active (30 pages found), scroll to view all results and check for pagination controls
steps.expected: Pagination controls available if results exceed page size, or all results loaded
steps.actual: All 30 filtered results are loaded in a continuous scrollable list without pagination controls. The system displays all matching results at once rather than using traditional pagination.

observations: The workflow filter dropdown displays all configured workflows including: None, Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Workflow, and Test & <> "Special" Chars! (demonstrating special character handling in workflow names).
The Page Search Results view uses a continuous loading approach rather than traditional pagination controls - all filtered results are loaded at once and can be scrolled through.
Workflow filter can be successfully combined with other filters (Page Type, Publish Status, Date Range, Tags) and text search.
Code repository at C:\DNN\Evoq.Extensions.Tester\repos/Dnn.AdminExperience.Evoq.Basic was empty, so code review was not possible. Testing was conducted based on UI behavior only.
